ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New
ygData.msgSnippet: Danielle, Run away,Run away don t look back. This game is evil I tell ya EVIL...... With that said, make you a toon let him twik it and you yourself will find
ygData.messageBody:
Danielle,
Run away,Run away don't look back. This game is evil
I tell ya EVIL......

With that said, make you a toon let him twik it and
you yourself will find the addiction :)

Wahahahahahahahaha another one takes the bait }:)


--- danielleheier <danielleheier@...> wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I'm Danielle and I'm quite new with EverQuest. It is
> my husband
> indeed who kind of made me interested in the game on
> the internet as
> he is very good at it and can play hours (when I say
> hours I mean
> LOTS of hours!!!) in a row!! I saw him playing a
> straight 24 hours
> recently.... :) So hopefully this group will help me
> understand the
> addiction it does create!! :)
>
> Thank you!!
>
> Danielle
>
>
